Posts.Content: my mom was diagnosed of stage2 breast ca.. now, she's very careful with what she eats. i was kinda curious if eating soya or vegie meat is not advisable for those breast cancer patients who has negative estrogen receptor like my mom.. is flax seed bad for her?
Posts.Title: Diet and Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: hi.. you know what we have the same concern about our moms.. my mom has breast ca and recenty the dr found 2 hepatic nodules n her liver.. most likely metastatic... and just this afternoon she had her bone scan and the results will be released on monday.. wish these are just trials and everything will turn out great.. lets keep on praying.. God wont give us hurdle we cannot solve.. keep up the faith.. try grapeseed capsule.. many people says it has healing effects.. hope this would work to our moms.. God bless..
Posts.Title: When Not to Quit

Posts.Content: my mother was diagnosed of breast ca, stage 2 last sept2005. she had her mrm and completed her 6rounds of chemotherapy recently. after her last chemo, we saw the glow in her face and the strength from deep within.. my friends and profesors were very supportive of my mom. then, one time, my father and i accompanied mom for her blood analysis, the results were great and very amusing.. upon heading home we decided to eat at a vegetarian resto (mom is very particular with the food that she eats)the owner of the resto went to our table and asked us if we went to the ceragem place where people used to go for treatment and it has said that it can cure almost every kind of disease. so as a cancer patient, she became interested to the place bec she thought it could help her. if you wanna know about the ceragem thing visit this site so you could relate to what i am talking about and know how it is done.. http://www.electrobeauty.com/ceragem.htm.. From then on, she started to feel pain from her back and chest, she has difficulty of breathing for a couple of days so my mom decided to have her apointment to her onco. last fri, my parents went to the hospital. Onco advised mom to have an appointment with her surgeon because he found node above her collarbone. so the next day mom met up with his surgeon.. that was the day i almost died.. the surgeon said "ohmigod no" "espie, im sorry" "for some onco, they would think that that node is related to your other breast. but, i am a surgeon, i dont think it is not because i can feel nothing in your right breast. I suspect it has spread to your bones... " we started to lose hope.. surgeon advised mom to have her bone scan and liver ultrasound.. just this fternoon, the result of the liver ultrasound says, "DEVELOPMENT OF TWO HEPTATIC NODULES SINCE THE 10/05/05 STUDY, MOST LIKELY METASTATIC" i dont know what to do when i read the result. the bone scan scheduled this fri, 06/14/2006.. and im afraid of what would be the result.. i was bothered when the surgeon said "espie, im sorry"" i feel like my mom is dying.. id be graduating from college this school yr and i hope mom will witness me as i march on my graduation.. i wanna blame it on the ceragem bed because mom was so fine up to to the time he started using it. do you think that bed affected moms back bone? is there anyone in here who can relate to my mom's situation from being a stage2 to having a metastatic lymph node in the liver? what are the chances of mom's survival? do u think she is dying 3-6months from now? do we have a metastatic breast cancer in here? what can you advise since mom decided that she wont be having chemotherapy if diagnosed of metastatic breast ca? we do not have enough money, is it ok to stop the therapy? many people says that chemotherapy could only shorten the chance of survival of a person, is this true? pls let me know.. for cancer survivors, what advise can you give for us who wants to spend longer time with our love ones, what are the foods that should be avoided.. we need your help..
Posts.Title: Mets to The Liver

Posts.Content: my mother was diagnosed of breast ca, stage 2 last sept2005. she had her mrm and completed her 6rounds of chemotherapy recently. after her last chemo, we saw the glow in her face and the strength from deep within.. my friends and profesors were very supportive of my mom. then, one time, my father and i accompanied mom for her blood analysis, the results were great and very amusing.. upon heading home we decided to eat at a vegetarian resto (mom is very particular with the food that she eats)the owner of the resto went to our table and asked us if we went to the ceragem place where people used to go for treatment and it has said that it can cure almost every kind of disease. so as a cancer patient, she became interested to the place bec she thought it could help her. if you wanna know about the ceragem thing visit this site so you could relate to what i am talking about and know how it is done.. http://www.electrobeauty.com/ceragem.htm.. From then on, she started to feel pain from her back and chest, she has difficulty of breathing for a couple of days so my mom decided to have her apointment to her onco. last fri, my parents went to the hospital. Onco advised mom to have an appointment with her surgeon because he found node above her collarbone. so the next day mom met up with his surgeon.. that was the day i almost died.. the surgeon said "ohmigod no" "espie, im sorry" "for some onco, they would think that that node is related to your other breast. but, i am a surgeon, i dont think it is not because i can feel nothing in your right breast. I suspect it has spread to your bones... " we started to lose hope.. surgeon advised mom to have her bone scan and liver ultrasound.. just this fternoon, the result of the liver ultrasound says, "DEVELOPMENT OF TWO HEPTATIC NODULES SINCE THE 10/05/05 STUDY, MOST LIKELY METASTATIC" i dont know what to do when i read the result. the bone scan scheduled this fri, 06/14/2006.. and im afraid of what would be the result.. i was bothered when the surgeon said "espie, im sorry"" i feel like my mom is dying.. id be graduating from college this school yr and i hope mom will witness me as i march on my graduation.. i wanna blame it on the ceragem bed because mom was so fine up to to the time he started using it. do you think that bed affected moms back bone? is there anyone in here who can relate to my mom's situation from being a stage2 to having a metastatic lymph node in the liver? what are the chances of mom's survival? do u think she is dying 3-6months from now? do we have a metastatic breast cancer in here? what can you advise since mom decided that she wont be having chemotherapy if diagnosed of metastatic breast ca? we do not have enough money, is it ok to stop the therapy? many people says that chemotherapy could only shorten the chance of survival of a person, is this true? pls let me know.. for cancer survivors, what advise can you give for us who wants to spend longer time with our love ones, what are the foods that should be avoided.. we need your help..

Posts.Title: 40 With Stage 4 Breast,with Bone Metts

Posts.Content: mom feels weaken every single day... do know anore what to do... im just waiting for some miracles to come..
Posts.Title: Please Help Me!!

Posts.Content: my mom was diagnosed of stage2 breast ca last sept 2005. she had her last chemo last apr.06.. just this afternoon, my mom's bone scan result revealed that there's multiple bone metastases.. last wk, the liver ultrasnd shows 2 hepatic nodules and most likely metastatic.. what can i do? pls help me.. some people says radiation/chemo could only shorten the lifespan of the patient.. is this true? what advise can u give? or fr the survivors, what alternative meds did u try? i need your help.. im losing hope.....
Posts.Title: i Need Your Help...

Posts.Content: can you give me the exact site? much thanks.
